U

Unit - Class in de.jhh4.pieces
object description: a settler is red, has a cost of 2 food, moves 1 tile per turn and can found a city abstraction: a unit type a unit object has a colour, a ressource cost, a speed value a method for founding a city units have a X,Y coordinate on the grid corresponding to the map array
